Description

## Compatibility
NetBox: >=4.5.0
Python: >=3.12

The test suite is run on all patch versions of the current minor version of NetBox, but only on the latest patch versions of older supported minors.

## Update procedure
* Run NetBox's `upgrade.sh`, and restart NetBox

Check [the documentation](https://alef-burzmali.github.io/netbox-data-flows/installation-configuration/#upgrade) for further instructions.
